      • setPosition

                        float y)
        Sets the translation of this transformation.
        Parameters:
        x - The new x position of this transfrom
        y - The new y position of this transform

      • setParent

        public void setParent(Transform transform)
        Reparents this transformation. The localToWorld Transformation is then the composed transformation of this transform and the parent localToWorld transformation.
        Parameters:
        transform - The transform that should be parent of this transform

      • getLocalToWorldTransformation

        public vine.math.Matrix4f getLocalToWorldTransformation()
        Transform, that transforms from the local space of this transform to world space. E.g used to render components with this transform.
        Returns:
        the local to world transformation

      • getWorldToLocalTransformation

        public vine.math.Matrix3f getWorldToLocalTransformation()
        Transformation, that can be used to transform directions and points in the local space of this transform.
        Returns:
        The world to local transformation

      • checkTransformStructure

        public boolean checkTransformStructure()
        Auxiliary function, that checks, if the parent structure is valid. For testing purpose.
        Returns:
        True, if the transform structure is valid.
